rules_text:
Whenever another red source you control deals damage to an opponent, excavate. [i](Put the bottom card of your library into your graveyard. If it's a land card, put a colorless artifact token named Loot onto the battlefield. It has ‘Sacrifice this artifact: Add {1} to your mana pool.')[/i]
{5}{R}{R}, Exile a land card from your graveyard: Put a 4/4 red Dragon artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
